entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
